name: The Game of Nothing (itch)
description:
The full release for The Game of Nothing is out now!

A game by Ultranite and NeeTroo where you do nothing!

STORY

Travel to the mystical world of nothing.

You are presented with a mysterious red button. You press it, leading you to nothing!

It seems like nothing is awaiting you!

FEATURES

  • Nothing!
  • Nothing!
  • Nothing!
  • Nothing!
  • and Nothing!

Narration: Sabatron

Composer: Synoxsis
